name: Remote CSV Data Display for SIMPANG.ID
author: Mpribadi, Gemini

sections.description: Fetches, caches, and displays data from a remote CSV file using a shortcode.
sections.changelog:
Version 1.1.0

  • Added column sorting.
  • Added pagination and limit with lazy load.

Version 1.0.0 - 1.0.2

  • Added self-hosted update functionality.
  • Minor performance improvements.
  • Security hardening.
  • Cleanup on deactivation.
